Title: software engineer
email_subject: Connecting with a Fellow University of Michigan Alum
email_body:
Dear Matt,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [name], and I am a [year] student at the University of Michigan, majoring in [major]. I am particularly interested in pursuing a career in [career_interests], and I noticed that you are currently a software engineer at Plaid.

As a fellow Wolverine, I would love the opportunity to connect and learn from your experiences in the tech industry. If you have 15-20 minutes to spare in the next couple of weeks, I would greatly appreciate any insights you could share about your career path and the work you do at Plaid.

Thank you for considering my request. I look forward to the possibility of chatting with you.

Best regards,

[name]
